definition: flag signals (for communicating between ships or army units)/semaphore
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: SEMMNS A system-wide limit on the number of semaphores in all semaphore sets.
sentences.chinese: 一個系統寬度限制所有的旗語的旗語號碼。

sentences.english: SEMMNS A system-wide limit on the number of semaphores in all semaphore sets.
sentences.chinese: 一個系統寬度限制所有的旗語的旗語號碼。

sentences.english: It is like a semaphore signal waving before the eyes of the particle physicists.
sentences.chinese: 它好象是在粒子物理學家眼前揮動的旗語信號。

sentences.english: The signalman on the ship wigwagged the good news to the other ship.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船上的信號員用旗語向另一艘船發送好消息。

sentences.english: SEMMNI A system-wide limit on the maximum number of semaphore identifiers .
sentences.chinese: 一個旗語標識符的最大號碼的系統寬度限制。
